# streamControl

**Instance Property**

Controls the camera stream.

## Declaration

```swift
var streamControl: HMCameraStreamControl? { get }
```

## Streaming

- **HMCameraStreamControl**: An object that can start and stop the camera stream and contains the view into which the stream is rendered.

items.description: An object that can start and stop the camera stream and contains the view into which the stream is rendered.
